welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tessenderlo, a charming city known for its beautiful nature and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the delights our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is responsible for all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
